name: MFGJ Summer '17: "Dodger"
description:
Game jam: My First Game Jam - Summer 2017

Title: Dodger 

Genre: Sidescrolling action platformer

Controls:
Left Arrow Key: Left
Right Arrow Key: Right
Up Arrow Key: Jump, Double-Jump
Shift:  Dash

There are many elements that were not added, so I might develop this further after the end of the game jam.

There are also some bugs that I was unable to fix in time.
